name: JUPITER CONTRACT
description:
This game was made for Brackeys game jam 2021.1, is somewhat a follow-up to my previous game KUIPER SHIFT (though very different in theme), and is a prototype for a much larger game I have in my head. If you'd like to see this concept developed further, I'd love to hear from you.

Uses fonts: m3x6 by Daniel Linssen, and "3x4 dot font" by piano_no_renshu. The mining vessel is inspired by the tall ship Hawaiian Chieftain.
